model

Class ShoppingCart

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ShoppingCart

  • public class ShoppingCart
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a shopping cart with a collection of item orders.
    Version:
    10 October 2014
    Author:
    Jonathan Hughes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Map<Item,ItemOrder> myCart
      A set of all the item orders that were added to the shopping cart.
      private boolean myMembership
      If customer has a membership for a discount or not.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShoppingCart()
      Constructs an empty shopping cart as a HashMap, without a store membership.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(ItemOrder theOrder)
      Adds the specified ItemOrder to the shopping cart.
      java.math.BigDecimal calculateTotal()
      Calculates the total price of all item orders in the shopping cart.
      void setMembership(boolean theMembership)
      Changes the membership status of the customer's shopping cart for discount purposes.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String representation of all item orders in the shopping cart separated by semicolons in the following format: "ItemOrder; Item Order; Item Order;", etc.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • myMembership

        private boolean myMembership
        If customer has a membership for a discount or not. True for yes, false if no.

      • myCart

        private final java.util.Map<Item,ItemOrder> myCart
        A set of all the item orders that were added to the shopping cart.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShoppingCart

        public ShoppingCart()
        Constructs an empty shopping cart as a HashMap, without a store membership.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(ItemOrder theOrder)
        Adds the specified ItemOrder to the shopping cart. Note: If the Item objects are the same as an existing order, the old order will be over written.
        Parameters:
        theOrder - the item order to add to the shopping cart
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the item order is null

      • setMembership

        public void setMembership(boolean theMembership)
        Changes the membership status of the customer's shopping cart for discount purposes.
        Parameters:
        theMembership - requested membership status, member = true, non-member = false

      • calculateTotal

        public java.math.BigDecimal calculateTotal()
        Calculates the total price of all item orders in the shopping cart. Applies a 10% discount if customer has a membership.
        Returns:
        the total price of all items in the shopping cart

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of all item orders in the shopping cart separated by semicolons in the following format: "ItemOrder; Item Order; Item Order;", etc.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
